summary: REQ-10 is largely implemented: ListingSection now includes a one-click "Copy submission details" action that formats app name/description/live URL (using window.location.origin) and uses a shared clipboard helper with success state ("Copied!") and console error logging on failure. However, the diff excerpt does not show any rendered, visible inline error UI when copying fails.

missing_requirements.requirement: If clipboard copy fails, the UI shows a visible non-crashing error state (e.g., inline message).
missing_requirements.reason: ListingSection.tsx sets copyError state and logs an error, but the provided diff excerpt does not show any JSX that conditionally renders an error message/state based on copyError. Because the file is truncated, this may exist below the truncation, but it is not evidenced in the shown diff.
evidence: frontend/src/features/market/ListingSection.tsx (truncated: shows copyError state set true/false and console.error, but no visible error rendering in shown portion)
